name: Peggy's Sesame Seed Sandwich Buns
ingredients: 1 tablespoon unflavored, unsweetened whey protein powder
Cooking spray or oil for greasing

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C). Grease a 6-hole muffin top pan well.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 150°C. Dobre vymastite formu na muffiny s 6 jamkami.
instructions.ja: オーブンを300°F（150°C）に予熱します。6穴のマフィントップパンに油をよく塗ります。

instructions.en: In a medium, non-plastic bowl, beat the egg whites and cream of tartar with an electric mixer until stiff peaks form.
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkej nemastnej miske vyšľahajte bielka a vínny kameň elektrickým mixérom, kým nevzniknú tuhé špičky.
instructions.ja: 中サイズのプラスチックではないボウルに卵白とクリームオブタルタルを入れ、電動ミキサーで固いピークができるまで泡立てます。

instructions.en: In a large bowl, beat the softened cream cheese until smooth.
instructions.sk: Vo veľkej miske vyšľahajte zmäknutý krémový syr dohladka.
instructions.ja: 大きなボウルに柔らかくしたクリームチーズを入れ、滑らかになるまで混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add Splenda and egg yolks to the cream cheese and beat until smooth.
instructions.sk: Pridajte Splendu a vaječné žĺtky ku krémovému syru a vyšľahajte dohladka.
instructions.ja: クリームチーズにスプレンダと卵黄を加え、滑らかになるまで混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add flax meal and whey protein powder to the cream cheese mixture; beat until blended.
instructions.sk: Pridajte ľanové semienka a srvátkovú bielkovinu do syrovej zmesi; vyšľahajte, kým sa nespoja.
instructions.ja: クリームチーズの混合物にフラックスミールとホエイプロテインパウダーを加え、よく混ざるまで混ぜます。

instructions.en: Gently fold the stiff egg whites into the yolk mixture using a large rubber spatula, until no large spots of white remain. Be careful not to deflate the egg whites.
instructions.sk: Jemne vmiešajte tuhé bielka do žĺtkovej zmesi pomocou veľkej gumenej stierky, kým nezmiznú všetky veľké biele škvrny. Dávajte pozor, aby ste bielka nesplaskli.
instructions.ja: 大きなゴムヘラを使って、卵白を卵黄の混合物に優しく折り込みます。大きな白い部分が残らないようにしますが、卵白をつぶさないよう注意してください。

instructions.en: Spoon the batter into the greased muffin top pan, dividing it evenly among the 6 holes.
instructions.sk: Nalejte cesto do vymastenej formy na muffiny, rozdeľte ho rovnomerne medzi 6 jamiek.
instructions.ja: 生地を油を塗ったマフィントップパンに注ぎ、6つの穴に均等に分けます。

instructions.en: Sprinkle the tops with sesame seeds.
instructions.ja: 表面にゴマをふりかけます。

instructions.en: Bake for 35 minutes until nice and brown.
instructions.ja: 35分間、きれいな茶色になるまで焼きます。

instructions.en: Remove from the pan and let cool on a wire rack. Store in the refrigerator.
instructions.sk: Vyberte z formy a nechajte vychladnúť na drôtenom rošte. Skladujte v chladničke.
instructions.ja: パンから取り出し、ワイヤーラックの上で冷まします。冷蔵庫で保存してください。

notes: These Sesame Seed Sandwich Buns are a low-carb alternative to traditional bread buns. They use a combination of eggs, cream cheese, flax meal, and whey protein powder instead of flour, making them suitable for a ketogenic diet. The technique of folding in beaten egg whites helps create a lighter texture. These buns can be used for sandwiches or as a side for meals. Remember to store them in the refrigerator due to their high egg content.
